question_text: Has a formal HIPAA security risk analysis been conducted within the last 12 months?
Does the risk analysis cover all systems locations and vendors handling ePHI?
Are identified risks formally tracked and remediated?
Is there a documented sanction policy for workforce violations?
Are system audit logs and access reports reviewed regularly?
Is a security officer formally assigned and documented?
Are workforce members granted access only as necessary?
Is access to ePHI authorized and supervised?
Is workforce clearance reviewed before granting access?
Is access removed promptly upon termination or role change?
Are formal information access management policies in place?
Are clearinghouse functions isolated where applicable?
Is role-based access control implemented?
Are access changes formally documented and approved?
Is HIPAA security training provided at least annually?
Are periodic security reminders communicated?
Is malware protection deployed and maintained?
Are login attempts monitored and anomalies reviewed?
Are password complexity and rotation enforced?
Is there a documented security incident response plan?
Is there a documented contingency plan?
Are backups of ePHI performed and tested?
Is a disaster recovery plan documented and tested?
Can critical operations continue during emergencies?
Are contingency plans tested periodically?
Is data and application criticality formally assessed?
Are periodic security evaluations conducted?
Is physical access to facilities restricted?
Are emergency access procedures for facilities defined?
Is there a facility security plan?
Is facility access validated and controlled?
Are facility maintenance records maintained?
Are workstation use policies defined?
Are workstations physically secured?
Are device and media controls documented?
Is ePHI media securely disposed?
Is ePHI removed before media reuse?
Are technical access controls enforced?
Are unique user IDs assigned?
Is emergency access procedure defined?
Is automatic logoff enabled?
Is ePHI encrypted at rest?
Are audit logs enabled and retained?
Are controls in place to protect data integrity?
Are mechanisms used to authenticate ePHI integrity?
Are users authenticated before accessing ePHI?
Is transmission of ePHI protected?
Are integrity controls applied to transmitted ePHI?
Is ePHI encrypted in transit?
Are Business Associate Agreements executed with all vendors?
